content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Understanding and Upholding HIPPA – Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As part of serving our Healthcare accounts, you are required to participate in ~90 minutes of training related to understanding and upholding the expectations related to HIPPA – Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act. This piece of US legislation, passed in 1996, provides data privacy and security provisions for safeguarding medical information. You are responsible for knowing and following the guidelines set forth in this training module, which is provided in two videos:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have already viewed these trainings via the Videoportal, please mark yourself complete by clicking 'Next' at the bottom of the page and following the instructions on the following
